bioconda.name: bioconductor-lapmix
bioconda.summary: Laplace Mixture Model in Microarray Experiments

biotools.summary: Laplace mixture modelling of microarray experiments. A hierarchical Bayesian approach is used, and the hyperparameters are estimated using empirical Bayes. The main purpose is to identify differentially expressed genes.

bioschemas.name: lapmix
bioschemas.summary: Laplace mixture modelling of microarray experiments. A hierarchical Bayesian approach is used, and the hyperparameters are estimated using empirical Bayes. The main purpose is to identify differentially expressed genes.
